title: Beautiful Two    Bedroom Units @ 2701 N Troy
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   The apartments 2701 N. Troy / 3120 W. Schubert feature one and two bedroom layouts with many upgrades including new windows, hardwood floors, updated kitchens, and ceramic tile bathrooms. You'll love how easy it is to walk to everything in this hot Logan Square neighborhood. Park your car and only use it when you feel like going for a drive. You're within easy walking distance of the Blue Line, restaurants, parks, nightlife, and the expressway. There is even a Divvy bike station nearby, so commuters and hobbyists can make use of this popular bike sharing program. If you're looking for a great value in an awesome Logan Square location, give this property a try!     ***Upcoming Units ***  ****Tenant Pays Heat ****  Two  Bedroom Apartment - Available July 5, 2022..................................Rent Starting at $1,200.00/Per Month     To make an appointment please call contact Eric 773 593 1147   or the office at 773 989 8000   ***Pictures shown may not be of actual unit available*** Don't miss out, make your appointment today!    LEASE TERMS:  *12 Month Lease **No Security Deposit ***$400.00 Move in Fee ****$75.00 Credit/ Background Check Fee (per Person Over the Age Of 18) *****NO DOGS     Managed By: Realty & Mortgage Co. 1509 W. Berwyn Ave., #200 Chicago, IL 60640 (P) 773-989-8000 (F) 773-989-6979   Equal Opportunity Housing
